DOCUMENT ()
  BEGIN_REGION (>>>DOCUMENT)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  title (title:: Listing Envi)
    string (title:: Listing Envi)
  id (id:: td-000006)
    string (id:: td-000006)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  PARAGRAPH (This SML document co)
    string (This SML document co)
  LISTING ()
    BEGIN_ENVIRONMENT (---LISTING)
    title (title:: My Listing)
      string (title:: My Listing)
    id (id:: my-listing)
      string (id:: my-listing)
    description (description:: This i)
      string (description:: This i)
    PREFORMATTED_BLOCK (listing line 1...listi)
    END_ENVIRONMENT (---LISTING)
  END_REGION (<<<DOCUMENT)
